page.title: 15MIDDLEBROOK MUSHROOMS
page.content:
Middlebrooks produce a million mushrooms a day! They have three units in the Selby area including the one in square 2957 at Gateforth Farm.
Middlebrook Mushrooms are a major employer in the district with 630 jobs at the three farms. A fleet of 20 vehicles is used to deliver the mushrooms and to collect compost and manure as a growing medium for the mushrooms.
Mushrooms are sold all over the UK,the most distant delivery being to Aberdeen. Customers include Tesco,Asda and Marks and Spencer. Middlebrook's large trucks are a common sight on the quiet lanes around Thorpe Willoughby.
